docs.text: Welcome to Cardano-Pooling-Simulator’s documentation! This is the documentation for the Cardano Pooling Simulation Engine built by the University of Edinburgh's Blockchain Technology Laboratory. Source code available on Github . ... Contributing All contributions are welcome, but please make sure to follow the guidelines: ... Example contributions include, but are not limited to, adding a new feature to the simulation (e.g. integration of exchange rates), improving the performance of the simulation, or creating a user-friendly interface for it.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: This is the documentation for the Cardano Pooling Simulation Engine built by the University of Edinburgh's Blockchain Technology Laboratory. Source code available on Github .
docs.title: Welcome to Cardano-Pooling-Simulator’s documentation!

docs.text: All contributions are welcome, but please make sure to follow the guidelines: ... Example contributions include, but are not limited to, adding a new feature to the simulation (e.g. integration of exchange rates), improving the performance of the simulation, or creating a user-friendly interface for it.
docs.title: Contributing

docs.text: Configuration The simulation engine is highly configurable. From the reward scheme parameters to be used to the output files to be generated, there are numerous variables that can vary from run to run.
docs.title: Configuation
